channel.title: Arduino on David C.
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on David C.

item.title: Free City Hacks
item.description: Exploring cool tech, learning together and helping each other out with bug fixes or new features… What’s your unicorn formular for being worldclass? Our approach to redefining the digital making experience in our beloved city, Aba, Nigeria, involves exploring the amazing capabilities of inexpensive tools like the Raspberry Pi computer and Arduino microcontroller, leveraging on free and accessible digital learning resources to supercharge our learning adventure. Through this drive, we hope to model an open and inclusive environment that inspires a new generation of hobbyists, tinkerers, hackers and inventors to learn together and support each other in building amazing projects that we can share with the maker community and the world in general.
